actions.text: DEBATE - Pursuant to H.Res. 26, the House proceeded with four minutes of debate on H. Res. 27.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to the rule.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 257 - 159, 3 Present (Roll no. 11).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Relating to the status of certain actions taken by Members-elect.

summary.text: Requires specified rollcall votes recorded for Representative-elect Sessions and Representative-elect Fitzpatrick be deleted and the vote-totals for each of those rollcalls be adjusted accordingly, both in the Journal and in the Congressional Record. Ratifies the election of Representative-elect Sessions to a standing committee and his participation in its proceedings. Considers the measures delivered by him to the Speaker for referral as introduced. Retains the numbers assigned. Considers as valid: (1) any submissions to the Congressional Record by Representative-elect Sessions or Representative-elect Fitzpatrick; and (2) any cosponsor lists naming them. Ratifies any non-voting participation by them in floor proceedings.

titles.title: Relating to the status of certain actions taken by Members-elect.
